comments:
My update site has two features (featureA and featureB) and featureB includes
featureA. I get the following NPE if featureB references wrong version of
featureA (I had to start Eclipse under debugger to figure that out)


java.lang.NullPointerException
	at
org.eclipse.pde.internal.build.builder.FeatureBuildScriptGenerator.generateAllFeaturesTarget(FeatureBuildScriptGenerator.java:676)
	at
org.eclipse.pde.internal.build.builder.FeatureBuildScriptGenerator.generateBuildScript(FeatureBuildScriptGenerator.java:257)
	at
org.eclipse.pde.internal.build.builder.FeatureBuildScriptGenerator.generate(FeatureBuildScriptGenerator.java:208)
	at
org.eclipse.pde.internal.build.BuildScriptGenerator.generateFeatures(BuildScriptGenerator.java:126)
	at
org.eclipse.pde.internal.build.BuildScriptGenerator.generate(BuildScriptGenerator.java:62)
	at
org.eclipse.pde.internal.ui.wizards.exports.FeatureExportJob.makeScript(FeatureExportJob.java:259)
	at
org.eclipse.pde.internal.ui.wizards.exports.FeatureExportJob.doExport(FeatureExportJob.java:196)
	at
org.eclipse.pde.internal.ui.wizards.exports.FeatureExportJob.doExports(FeatureExportJob.java:150)
	at
